law.catch_line: Certification of notice of liens, certificates, or other notices affecting federal liens by the Secr...
law.text: Certification of notice of liens, certificates, or other notices affecting federal liens by the Secretary of the Treasury of the United States, his delegate, or by any official or entity of the United States responsible for filing or certifying of notice of any other lien, entitles them to be filed and no other attestation, certification, or acknowledgement is necessary.
